languages.text: "Воистину правду говорят, что Вольные Торговцы блистательны во всем, за что берутся".
"So it's true what they say about Rogue Traders — you really are brilliant at whatever you turn your hand to."
languages.original_text: "Воистину правду говорят, что Вольные Торговцы блистательны во всем, за что берутся".

traits.locale_text: "So it's true what they say about Rogue Traders — you really are brilliant at whatever you turn your hand to."

languages.text: “原来大家对行商浪人的评价是真的。无论你做什么事情，都能做得出神入化。”
languages.original_text: "So it's true what they say about Rogue Traders — you really are brilliant at whatever you turn your hand to."

traits.locale_text: “原来大家对行商浪人的评价是真的。无论你做什么事情，都能做得出神入化。”

languages.text: 「自由開拓者に関する話は本当だった…あんたは、何をやってもサイコーだよ」
languages.original_text: "So it's true what they say about Rogue Traders — you really are brilliant at whatever you turn your hand to."

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者に関する話は本当だった…あんたは、何をやってもサイコーだよ」

languages.text: «Así que es cierto eso que dicen de los Comerciantes Independientes. Son brillantes en todo lo que deciden hacer».
languages.original_text: "So it's true what they say about Rogue Traders — you really are brilliant at whatever you turn your hand to."

traits.locale_text: «Así que es cierto eso que dicen de los Comerciantes Independientes. Son brillantes en todo lo que deciden hacer».

languages.text: « C'est donc vrai, ce qu'on raconte sur les libres-marchands : vous avez un véritable don pour tout ce que vous entreprenez. »
languages.original_text: "So it's true what they say about Rogue Traders — you really are brilliant at whatever you turn your hand to."

traits.locale_text: « C'est donc vrai, ce qu'on raconte sur les libres-marchands : vous avez un véritable don pour tout ce que vous entreprenez. »

languages.text: "Es stimmt also, was man über Freihändler sagt – Ihr glänzt immer, egal, was Ihr anpackt."
languages.original_text: "So it's true what they say about Rogue Traders — you really are brilliant at whatever you turn your hand to."

traits.locale_text: "Es stimmt also, was man über Freihändler sagt – Ihr glänzt immer, egal, was Ihr anpackt."

languages.text: "Demek Hür Tacirler hakkında söylenenler doğruymuş. Elini neye atarsan at muazzam iş çıkarıyorsun."
languages.original_text: "So it's true what they say about Rogue Traders — you really are brilliant at whatever you turn your hand to."

traits.locale_text: "Demek Hür Tacirler hakkında söylenenler doğruymuş. Elini neye atarsan at muazzam iş çıkarıyorsun."
